gloss: A room or establishment where alcoholic drinks are served over a counter.
The body of members of the legal profession, particularly lawyers.
A horizontal piece of metal used as a weight.
The body of persons qualified to practise law in a particular jurisdiction.
A rectangular block of metal, especially one made of tin or lead.
A rigid horizontal piece of metal or other material, usually used to fasten or secure something
The body of persons admitted to the profession of law in a particular jurisdiction.
A long, narrow, flat piece of metal or other substance.
